snippet.title: The Hidden Fragmentation - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Download from Game Jolt:
https://gamejolt.com/games/the-hidden-fragmentation/306299


"You know these buildings aren't abandoned for nothing."

The Hidden Fragmentation is a short adventure game with a simple story and some platformer elements but the main goal is to explore the environment and find the fragmentation.
